overview:
Stephen Baker, B.S. RT(R) MR, founded Radiology Protocols with over 30 years of hands on experience in the medical imaging industry. As of 2010, he shifted his focus to building a business with the goal of reducing waste and inefficiencies in the medical imaging field by leveraging improvements in technology and communications to streamline the process of managing radiology protocols and test procedures. In under a year, Radiology Protocols established itself as a niche service provider to the medical imaging community, serving over 2,200 users in 119 countries and dozens of hospitals and institutions.

Baker also closed deals for the Radiology Protocols software to be piloted at the University of Iowa and the University of California and is in the final stages with 6 additional Centers’ of Excellence locations planned for implementation in Q3, 2011. This includes the University of Southern California and facilities in Frankfurt Germany, Cape Town South Africa, Malmo Sweden, Manheim Germany, Melbourne Australia and Luchnow India.

In addition to his domestic business development efforts, Stephen recently oversaw Radiology Protocol’s European launch by signing an enterprise agreement with Bender Gruppe in Germany and rolling out the software to 150 clinics in Germany.
